text: Tolgabide (INN; development code SL-81.0142) is a drug which was patented by Synthélabo as an anticonvulsant but was never marketed. It is an analogue of progabide and acts similarly to it as a prodrug of GABA, and therefore as an indirect agonist of the GABA receptors. == See also == * Progabide * Fengabine == References == Category:Anticonvulsants Category:Chloroarenes Category:Phenols Category:Carboxamides Category:GABAA receptor agonists Category:GABAA-rho receptor agonists Category:GABAB receptor agonists Category:Prodrugs Category:Abandoned drugs
title: Tolgabide
